subject: Your Insurance Policy Documentation - Main Test

templateValues.ICS_Term1: Coverage is valid for 12 months from start date
templateValues.ICS_Term3: Claims must be submitted within 30 days

bodyContent:
Dear John Doe,

Please find your insurance policy documentation attached. This document contains all the details of your coverage including benefits, limits, and terms.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
Insurance Team
